name: Angband
description: Angband is an updated version of the game Moria, adding more monsters, character races and classes; deepening the dungeon from 50 levels to 100; and including such new features as monster pits and unique items. The object of the game is to become powerful enough to defeat a difficult unique monster, Morgoth, at the bottom of the dungeon.
alsoFor: Acorn 32-bit, Amiga, Android, BeOS, DOS, GP2X, GP2X Wiz, Linux, Macintosh, OS/2, Windows, Windows Mobile | Combined View
